parameters.name: DrawingTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename ( .slddrt ) of the drawing template to use

parameters.name: ShowTemplate
parameters.description: True to show the sheet format, false to not NOTE: Valid only for standard sheet sizes and when Width and Height are set to 0.

title: ISldWorks.PresetNewDrawingParameters
description: Presets the drawing template and sheet size parameters to avoid showing the Sheet Format/Size dialog when creating a new drawing document in the user-interface.
signature:
System.Boolean PresetNewDrawingParameters( 
   System.String
DrawingTemplate
,
   System.Boolean
ShowTemplate
,
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Height
)

parameters.name: DrawingTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename ( .slddrt ) of the drawing template to use

parameters.name: ShowTemplate
parameters.description: True to show the sheet format, false to not NOTE: Valid only for standard sheet sizes and when Width and Height are set to 0.

returns: True if the specified drawing template and sheet size parameters are set, false if not
remarks:
To show the Sheet Format/Size dialog the next time a new drawing document is opened (SOLIDWORKS default behavior), call
ISldWorks::ResetPresetDrawingParameters
after calling this method and opening a new drawing document.

examples.title: Preset and Reset Template and Sheet Parameters for New Drawing Documents (VBA)
